name: Ghosting
description: A faint image of a previous print appears on the current print. Often caused by issues with the drum or fuser unit.

name: Streaks
description: Lines or bands of toner running down the page. This can be caused by a damaged drum or a low toner cartridge.

name: Paper Jams
description: The paper gets stuck in the printer's pathway. Often caused by worn rollers, incorrect paper type, or moisture.

name: Faded Print
description: The text or images are light and difficult to read. This is a classic sign of a low toner or ink cartridge.
